mapper.select: SELECT S.* , ROWNUM AS APPR_SEQ FROM ( SELECT 1 AS APPR_TYPE_CD , 1 AS SEQ , #{sabun} AS SABUN , F_WTM_GET_EMP_NM(#{tenantId}, #{enterCd}, #{sabun}, #{d}) AS EMP_NM FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS APPR_TYPE_CD , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY APPR_SEQ) AS SEQ , CASE WHEN EMP_HIS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN H.SABUN ELSE O.SABUN END AS SABUN , F_WTM_GET_EMP_NM(#{tenantId}, #{enterCd}, CASE WHEN EMP_HIS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN H.SABUN ELSE O.SABUN END, #{d}) AS EMP_NM FROM ( SELECT TENANT_ID , ENTER_CD , S.ORG_CD , LEVEL AS APPR_SEQ FROM ( SELECT C.TENANT_ID, C.ENTER_CD, D.* FROM WTM_ORG_CHART C JOIN WTM_ORG_CHART_DET D ON C.ORG_CHART_ID = D.ORG_CHART_ID WHERE C.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND C.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND #{d} BETWEEN C.SYMD AND C.EYMD ) S START WITH S.ORG_CD = (SELECT ORG_CD FROM WTM_EMP_HIS H WHERE H.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} AND H.ENTER_CD=#{enterCd} AND H.SABUN=#{sabun} AND #{d} BETWEEN H.SYMD AND H.EYMD) CONNECT BY PRIOR S.PRIOR_ORG_CD = ORG_CD ) X LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_EMP_HIS H ON X.TENANT_ID = H.TENANT_ID AND X.ENTER_CD = H.ENTER_CD AND X.ORG_CD = H.ORG_CD AND H.LEADER_YN = 'Y' AND #{d} BETWEEN H.SYMD AND H.EYMD AND H.SABUN <> #{sabun} LEFT OUTER JOIN WTM_ORG_CONC O ON X.TENANT_ID = O.TENANT_ID AND X.ENTER_CD = O.ENTER_CD AND X.ORG_CD = O.ORG_CD AND #{d} BETWEEN O.SYMD AND O.EYMD WHERE (EMP_HIS_ID IS NOT NULL OR ORG_CONC_ID IS NOT NULL) UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS APPR_TYPE_CD , SEQ , RL.SABUN AS SABUN , F_WTM_GET_EMP_NM(AC.TENANT_ID, AC.ENTER_CD, RL.SABUN, #{d}) AS EMP_NM FROM WTM_APPL_REC_LINE RL JOIN WTM_APPL_CODE AC ON RL.APPL_CODE_ID = AC.APPL_CODE_ID WHERE (AC.TENANT_ID, AC.ENTER_CD, AC.APPL_CD) IN (SELECT #{tenantId}, #{enterCd}, #{applCd} FROM dual) ORDER BY APPR_TYPE_CD, SEQ ) S

SELECT L.APPR_TYPE_CD , L.APPR_SEQ , F_WTM_GET_CODE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, 'APPR_TYPE_CD', L.APPR_TYPE_CD, A.APPL_YMD) AS APPR_TYPE_NM , L.APPR_SABUN AS SABUN , F_WTM_GET_EMP_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, L.APPR_SABUN, A.APPL_YMD) AS EMP_NM , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(L.APPR_DATE, 'YMD') AS APPR_DATE , L.APPR_STATUS_CD , F_WTM_GET_CODE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, 'APPR_STATUS_CD', L.APPR_STATUS_CD, A.APPL_YMD) AS APPR_STATUS_NM , L.APPR_OPINION FROM WTM_APPL_LINE L JOIN WTM_APPL A ON L.APPL_ID = A.APPL_ID WHERE L.APPL_ID = #{applId} ORDER BY APPR_SEQ

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT INNER_TABLE.* , ROWNUM AS ROW_SEQ FROM (
<<<<<<< HEAD
======= <![CDATA[ >>>>>>> branch 'master' of https://github.com/isusys/if-work.git SELECT A.APPL_ID , A.APPL_CD , C.APPL_NM , A.APPL_SABUN , F_WTM_GET_EMP_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.APPL_SABUN, A.APPL_YMD ) AS EMP_NM , A.APPL_YMD , A.APPL_IN_SABUN , A.APPL_STATUS_CD , F_WTM_GET_CODE_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, 'APPL_STATUS_CD', A.APPL_STATUS_CD, A.APPL_YMD) AS APPL_STATUS_NM , L.APPR_SEQ , L.APPR_SABUN , L.APPR_DATE , L.APPR_STATUS_CD , L.APPR_TYPE_CD , L.APPR_OPINION , A.ENTER_CD || '@' || A.APPL_CD || '@' || A.APPL_ID || '@' || #{typeCd} || '@' || A.APPL_SABUN || '@WTM' AS APPL_KEY , CASE WHEN A.APPL_CD = 'OT' THEN 'view://W02View' WHEN A.APPL_CD = 'ENTRY_CHG' THEN 'view://W04View' ELSE NULL END AS URL_LINK FROM WTM_APPL A JOIN WTM_APPL_CODE C ON A.TENANT_ID = C.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = C.ENTER_CD AND A.APPL_CD = C.APPL_CD JOIN (SELECT * FROM WTM_APPL_LINE WHERE (APPL_ID, APPR_SABUN, APPR_SEQ) IN ( SELECT APPL_ID, APPR_SABUN, MAX(APPR_SEQ) FROM WTM_APPL_LINE WHERE APPR_TYPE_CD <> 1 AND APPR_SABUN = #{empNo} AND APPR_DATE IS NOT NULL AND APPR_STATUS_CD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY APPL_ID, APPR_SABUN )) L ON L.APPL_ID = A.APPL_ID WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND APPR_SABUN = #{empNo} AND L.APPR_TYPE_CD <> 1 AND L.APPR_DATE IS NOT NULL AND L.APPR_STATUS_CD IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.APPL_YMD DESC
) INNER_TABLE WHERE TO_NUMBER(ROWNUM) <= ((#{startPage}+1) * #{pageCount}) ) WHERE ROW_SEQ BETWEEN ((#{startPage}*#{pageCount})+1) AND ((#{startPage}+1) * #{pageCount})

SELECT count(*) FROM WTM_APPL A JOIN WTM_APPL_CODE C ON A.TENANT_ID = C.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = C.ENTER_CD AND A.APPL_CD = C.APPL_CD JOIN WTM_APPL_LINE L ON L.APPL_ID = A.APPL_ID WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND APPR_SABUN = #{sabun} AND L.APPR_STATUS_CD = '10' AND A.APPL_STATUS_CD IN ('21','31') ORDER BY A.APPL_YMD DESC

SELECT ''|| A.myRequestCnt as myRequestCnt, ''|| B.requestCnt as requestCnt, ''|| myRequestcnt+requestCnt as totRequestCnt FROM ( SELECT count(*) myRequestCnt FROM WTM_APPL A JOIN WTM_APPL_CODE C ON A.TENANT_ID = C.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = C.ENTER_CD AND A.APPL_CD = C.APPL_CD WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND (APPL_SABUN = #{sabun} OR APPL_IN_SABUN = #{sabun}) AND A.APPL_STATUS_CD IN ('21','31', '41') ) A inner join ( SELECT count(*) as requestCnt FROM WTM_APPL A JOIN WTM_APPL_CODE C ON A.TENANT_ID = C.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = C.ENTER_CD AND A.APPL_CD = C.APPL_CD JOIN WTM_APPL_LINE L ON L.APPL_ID = A.APPL_ID WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND APPR_SABUN = #{sabun} AND L.APPR_STATUS_CD = '10' AND A.APPL_STATUS_CD IN ('21','31')) B ON 1=1

SELECT CASE WHEN X.YMD < F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(X.SDAY, 'YMD') OR X.YMD > F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(X.EDAY, 'YMD') THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS valDate, (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(X.SDAY, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')|| ' ~ '|| TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(X.EDAY, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AS pDate, CASE WHEN X.HOLIDAY_YN = 'Y' AND REPLACE(#{shm},':','') != '' AND REPLACE(#{ehm},':','') != '' AND (REPLACE(#{sHm},':','') < X.HOL_IN_SHM OR REPLACE(#{ehm},':','') > X.HOL_IN_EHM) THEN 'N' WHEN X.HOLIDAY_YN = 'N' AND REPLACE(#{shm},':','') != '' AND REPLACE(#{ehm},':','') != '' AND (REPLACE(#{shm},':','') < X.IN_SHM OR REPLACE(#{ehm},':','') > X.IN_EHM) THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS valTime, CASE WHEN X.HOLIDAY_YN = 'Y' THEN (SUBSTR(X.HOL_IN_SHM, 1,2)|| ':'|| SUBSTR(X.HOL_IN_SHM, 3,4)|| ' ~ '|| SUBSTR(X.HOL_IN_EHM, 1,2)|| ':'|| SUBSTR(X.HOL_IN_EHM, 3,4)) ELSE (SUBSTR(X.IN_SHM, 1,2)|| ':'|| SUBSTR(X.IN_SHM, 3,4)|| ' ~ '|| SUBSTR(X.IN_EHM, 1,2)|| ':'|| SUBSTR(X.IN_EHM, 3,4)) END AS pTime, CASE WHEN REPLACE(#{ehm},':','') = '' OR REPLACE(#{shm},':','') = '' OR REPLACE(#{ehm},':','') IS NULL OR REPLACE(#{shm},':','') IS NULL THEN 'Y' WHEN X.HOLIDAY_YN = 'N' AND MOD(#{calcMinute}, X.TIME_UNIT) = 0 THEN 'Y' WHEN X.HOLIDAY_YN = 'Y' AND MOD(#{calcMinute}, X.HOL_APPL_TYPE_CD) = 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS valUnit, CASE WHEN X.HOLIDAY_YN = 'Y' THEN X.HOL_APPL_TYPE_CD ELSE X.TIME_UNIT END AS pUnit, CASE WHEN REPLACE(#{ehm},':','') = '' OR REPLACE(#{shm},':','') = '' THEN 'Y' WHEN X.HOLIDAY_YN = 'N' THEN 'Y' WHEN X.HOLIDAY_YN = 'Y' AND #{calcMinute} <= HOL_MAX_MINUTE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS valHunit, X.HOL_MAX_MINUTE AS pHunit, CASE WHEN #{subYn} = 'Y' AND REPLACE(#{subsSymd},'.','') < F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(X.SSDAY, 'YMD') OR REPLACE(#{subsSymd},'.','') > F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(X.SEDAY, 'YMD') THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS valSdate, (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(X.SSDAY, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')||' ~ '|| TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(X.SEDAY, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AS pSdate FROM (SELECT C.HOLIDAY_YN, C.YMD, F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE, 'YMD'), A.SUBS_SDAY, A.SUBS_EDAY, A.IN_SHM, A.IN_EHM, A.HOL_IN_SHM, A.HOL_IN_EHM, A.TIME_UNIT, A.HOL_APPL_TYPE_CD, A.HOL_MAX_MINUTE, CASE WHEN A.OT_APPL_SDAY IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-A.OT_APPL_SDAY, 'yyyyMMdd') ELSE F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE, 'YMD') END AS SDAY, CASE WHEN A.OT_APPL_EDAY IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+A.OT_APPL_EDAY, 'yyyyMMdd') ELSE F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE, 'YMD') END AS EDAY, CASE WHEN A.SUBS_SDAY IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.YMD, 'yyyyMMdd')-A.SUBS_SDAY, 'yyyyMMdd') ELSE C.YMD END AS SSDAY, CASE WHEN A.SUBS_EDAY IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.YMD, 'yyyyMMdd')+A.SUBS_EDAY, 'yyyyMMdd') ELSE C.YMD END AS SEDAY FROM WTM_WORK_CALENDAR C JOIN WTM_APPL_CODE A ON A.TENANT_ID = C.TENANT_ID AND C.ENTER_CD=A.ENTER_CD AND A.APPL_CD=#{applCd} WHERE C.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} AND C.ENTER_CD=#{enterCd} AND C.SABUN=#{sabun} AND C.YMD=REPLACE(#{ymd} ,'.','') ) X

SELECT L.SABUN , EMP_NM , F_WTM_GET_ORG_NM(TENANT_ID, ENTER_CD, ORG_CD, SYMD) , EMP_ID , APPL_REC_LINE_ID , APPL_CODE_ID , SEQ , L.NOTE FROM WTM_APPL_REC_LINE L JOIN WTM_EMP_HIS H ON L.SABUN = H.SABUN AND #{d} BETWEEN H.SYMD AND H.EYMD WHERE H.TENANT_ID = ${tenantId} AND H.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND L.APPL_CODE_ID = ${applCodeId}
